alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:20PM EDT until July 28 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WORCESTER...SOUTHEASTERN HAMPSHIRE...SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND CENTRAL HAMPDEN COUNTIES... At 720 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holyoke, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... South Hadley around 730 PM EDT. Springfield, Chicopee and Granby around 735 PM EDT. Ludlow and Wilbraham around 745 PM EDT. Monson and Hampden around 750 PM EDT. Palmer around 800 PM EDT. Warren, West Brookfield and Brimfield around 805 PM EDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
